SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AlgorithmSelectionController
Controller for selecting the study algorithm and setting the cycle count for Spaced Repetition.
BasicRotationalAlgorithm
A basic implementation of a flashcard study algorithm that rotates through the flashcards in order.
ConfigHandler
Handles the configuration of the FlashcardApp.
Deck
Represents a deck of flashcards in the FlashcardApp.
DeckCreationSceneController
Controller for the deck creation scene, managing UI interactions for creating and editing flashcards.
DeckHandler
Handles loading and saving of deck objects to and from files.
DeckInfo
Represents information about a deck of flashcards including the deck's name, file path, count of flashcards, and mastery levels of individual flashcards.
Flashcard
Represents a flashcard in the FlashcardApp.
FlashcardApp
Main application class for the Flashcard study helper.
IAlgorithm
Interface for algorithms that manage the logic of study sessions using flashcards.
IDeckHandler
Interface defining the contract for handling deck operations such as loading and saving.
MainSceneController
Controller for the main scene of the FlashcardApp.
SettingsSceneController
Controller for handling settings-related interactions in the FlashcardApp.
SpacedRepetitionAlgorithm
An implementation of the spaced repetition algorithm for studying flashcards.
StudySessionSceneController
Controller for managing the study session UI and interactions in a Flashcard application.
